name: Birday Arcade
description:
This game is an arcade games where you can unlock more weapons, ammo expansion, weapon abilities, and gain more defense. 

You can customize controls by pressing [ENTER] key and input any keys you want (CAUTION: SHIFT, CNTRL, FN Keys and ALT does not work).

You can customize difficulty for the game, but you still have start from scratch in terms of unlocking weapons and other things.

You can customize how your game should look like.

Back Story:

A few years after the one man rebellion (leaves off from Asteray) and the defeat of the leader, the rebel decides to hide underground on planet Earth. Meanwhile the leader still survived by using a teleportation system to his underground laboratory on planet Earth. He made a robot called Birday (a female robot) which malfuntioned and decides to escape from his lab. The rebel somehow found Birday, took her in, and decides to test her functionality hence the Birday Arcade.

Follow me if you like the game and Backstory.
